amendment.description: An amendment to require that not later than 90 days after enactment, and annually thereafter, the President shall submit to Congress a report listing contributions of the United States Government for the preceding fiscal year to the United Nations and United Nations affiliated agencies and related bodies.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Garrett (NJ) amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A064) offered by Mr. Garrett (NJ).
